Hi XuCe,


you need to make use of the „mirror“ material in that case, if you use the classic back-ward mode in Radiance. It will generate a virtual light source for a flat surface. Make sure that the surface normal points to the correct direction.


An example:


void mirror mirrorMat
0
0
4	.9	.9	.9


Please check ray.html as coming with Radiance (directory ray/doc) for details.


Cheers, Lars.
